pr_title: Fix jstyle was invalid with default section at the start

timeline.message:
Fix jstyle was invalid with default section at the start

Fixes #6303
Adapted the error message to give a hint what is probably missing.

I also noticed a problem in eclipse when executing the L10n test. It was missing an add-opens

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to get more information (than a boolean) about why a style file is not valid? I guess the missing default may only be one of many reasons and so far the error message is not really helpful in diagnosing the problem.
